admin_templates.template:
<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][enabled]" label="{$preparedOption.title}" selected="{$preparedOption.option_value.enabled}"> <xen:textbox name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][flaCat]" value="{$preparedOption.option_value.flaCat}" placeholder="{xen:phrase option_itm_ctSSB_flattr_category}" /> <xen:textbox name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][flaUs]" value="{$preparedOption.option_value.flaUs}" placeholder="{xen:phrase option_itm_ctSSB_flattr_user}" /> </xen:option>
<xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> <xen:html> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html>
</xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:checkboxunit label="{xen:phrase option_itm_ctSSB_info}"> <xen:option name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][enabled]" label="{$preparedOption.title}" selected="{$preparedOption.option_value.enabled}"> <xen:textbox name="{$fieldPrefix}[{$preparedOption.option_id}][infoURL]" value="{$preparedOption.option_value.infoURL}" /> </xen:option>
<xen:explain>{xen:raw $preparedOption.explain}</xen:explain> <xen:html> <input type="hidden" name="{$listedFieldName}" value="{$preparedOption.option_id}" /> {xen:raw $editLink} </xen:html>
</xen:checkboxunit>

{xen:phrase options}: {$group.title} {$group.title} + {xen:phrase add_option} {xen:phrase display_order} {xen:phrase edit_group}
{xen:phrase option_groups}: {$group.title}

{xen:phrase option_groups}

  • {$_group.title}
    •
{xen:raw $group.description}
  • {xen:phrase itm_ctSSB_tab_defaultOptions}
  • {xen:phrase itm_ctSSB_tab_shareposition}
  • {xen:phrase itm_ctSSB_tab_socialservice}
  • {xen:phrase itm_ctSSB_tab_supportMe}
  • {xen:calc '{$i} + 1'} {xen:raw $renderedOption}

phrases.phrase: I've found this page at {sitename}, maybe you should take a look.
That could be interesting for your ..
Options for the new c't Shariff Social Buttons.
These options let you se the counts how often your page is shared.
If enabled, you should enter the flattr category and the flattr user how will catch all what was flattred.
Set the URL for the Info button. This works globally.
Choose .min.css if Font Awesome is already included.
Set the path to the CSS files, e.g. styles/itm/ctSSB/shariff.min.css or styles/itm/ctSSB/shariff.complete.css.
Choose .min.js if jQuery is already included.
Set the path to the JS files, e.g. js/itm/ctSSB/shariff.min.js or js/itm/ctSSB/shariff.complete.js.
The localisation to use. Available: bg, de, en, es, fi, hr, hu, ja, ko, no, pl, pt, ro, ru, sk, sl, sr, sv, tr, zh

Set an fixed width for the buttons in the responsive view at share page and forum view. This work not for share buttons in the sidebar.
Set width in px (e.g. 62px).
You may also choose to support the author directly with a voluntary donation in USD or in EUR.
Set the theme for the buttons.

modification.description: Set Buttons into CTA Share Template
Set Responsive Buttons into xenMiG Share Widget
Set Buttons into xenMiG Share Widget

{xen:phrase tweet}
1
